import React, { Component } from 'react'; import {Nav,Table,Card,Row, Container}from 'react-bootstrap'; import '../../App.css'; class StudentProfile extends Component { constructor(props) { super() this.state = {student: JSON.parse( sessionStorage.getItem('student')) } console.log(this.state) // alert('this.state is ' + JSON.stringify(this.state)) // alert('this.state.student.firstname is ' + this.state.student.firstname) // alert('this.state.student.lastname is ' + this.state.student.lastname) // alert('this.state.student.location is ' + this.state.student.location) } render() { return (






{this.state.student.firstname} {this.state.student.lastname}

Location: {this.state.student.location}

Date of Birth: {this.state.student.dateofbirth}

Email: {this.state.student.email}

School Program: {this.state.student.schoolprogram}

Subject Context Tasks Completed Duration Language Tutor Selected

); } } export default StudentProfile;
